com.sugarcrm.candybean.automation.control

Class VSelect

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sugarcrm.candybean.automation.control.VControl
      • com.sugarcrm.candybean.automation.control.VSelect

  • public class VSelect
extends VControl
    VSelect is a control that represents and allows for interaction with the SELECT element.
    Author:
    cwarmbold

       VInterface iface,
       VHook.Strategy strategy,
       String hook)
        throws Exception
        Instantiate a VSelect object.
        Parameters:
        voodoo - Candybean object for this run
        iface - VInterface for this run
        strategy - VHook.Strategy used to search for element
        hook - value of strategy to search for
        Throws:
        Exception - hook does not grab a SELECT

      • isSelected

        public boolean isSelected(List<String> options,
                 boolean exclusive)
        Determine whether a specific configuration of options is selected. If the exclusive flag is set to true then this method will return false if the selected options don't exactly match the list of options passed in.
        Parameters:
        options -
        Returns:
        true if the options are selected
